trans-unit.source: Provides User Datagram Protocol (UDP) network services.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP) 網路服務。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class provides simple methods for sending and receiving connectionless UDP datagrams in blocking synchronous mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>類別會提供簡單的方法，以傳送和接收無連接的 UDP 資料包封鎖同步模式。

trans-unit.source: Because UDP is a connectionless transport protocol, you do not need to establish a remote host connection prior to sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: UDP 是一種無連接的傳輸通訊協定，因為您不需要建立遠端主機連接前傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: You do, however, have the option of establishing a default remote host in one of the following two ways:
trans-unit.target: 您執行動作，不過，有下列兩種方式之一建立預設遠端主機的選項：

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class using the remote host name and port number as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>類別使用的遠端主機名稱和連接埠號碼做為參數。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class and then call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>類別，然後呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use any of the send methods provided in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> to send data to a remote device.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用任何中提供的傳送方法<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>將資料傳送到遠端裝置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method to receive data from remote hosts.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法，以接收來自遠端主機的資料。

trans-unit.source: Do not call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> using a host name or <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> if you have already specified a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>使用主機名稱或<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>如果您已經指定預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: If you do, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您這樣做，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> methods also allow you to send and receive multicast datagrams.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> 方法也可讓您傳送和接收多點傳送的資料包。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> method to subscribe a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>方法來訂閱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>至多點傳送群組。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A> method to unsubscribe a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> from a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>方法來取消訂閱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>從多點傳送群組。

trans-unit.source: The following example establishes a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> connection using the host name www.contoso.com on port 11000.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>11000 的連接埠上使用主機名稱 www.contoso.com 的連線。

trans-unit.source: A small string message is sent to two separate remote host machines.
trans-unit.target: 小型字串訊息會傳送至兩個不同的遠端主機的機器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method blocks execution until a message is received.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法會封鎖執行，直到接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> passed to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>, the identity of the responding host is revealed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>傳遞至<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>，顯示回應主機的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: To establish an outgoing connection or accept an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立傳出連線，或接受連入要求。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> and allows the underlying service provider to assign the most appropriate local IPv4 address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>並允許基礎的服務提供者指派最適合的本機 IPv4 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with an address family of IPv4 that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with an IPv6 target.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個建構函式，則<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>執行個體已設定無法變更或覆寫具有 IPv6 目標的連線方法呼叫的 IPv4 位址系列。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not suitable for joining a multicast group because it does not perform socket binding.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不適合用來聯結多點傳送的群組，因為它不會執行通訊端繫結。

trans-unit.source: Also, it works only with IPv4 address types.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它只適用於 IPv4 位址類型。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the default constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用預設建構函式建立的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>類別。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The local port number from which you intend to communicate.
trans-unit.target: 您想通訊的本機通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> class and binds it to the local port number provided.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將它繫結至提供的本機通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and binds it to the port number from which you intend to communicate.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>並將它連結至您要通訊的通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you are only interested in setting the local port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只想要設定的本機連接埠號碼，請使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The underlying service provider will assign the local IP address.
trans-unit.target: 基礎的服務提供者會指派本機 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: If you pass 0 to the constructor, the underlying service provider will assign a port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 0 傳遞至建構函式時，基礎的服務提供者會指派通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with an address family of IPv4 that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with an IPv6 target.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個建構函式，則<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>執行個體已設定無法變更或覆寫具有 IPv6 目標的連線方法呼叫的 IPv4 位址系列。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This constructor works only with IPv4 address types.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式只適用於 IPv4 位址類型。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using a local port number to create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用本機連接埠號碼建立的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="port" /> parameter is greater than <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="port" /> 參數大於 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> that respresents the local endpoint to which you bind the UDP connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" />，表示繫結 UDP 連接的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> class and binds it to the specified local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將它繫結至指定的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> and binds it to the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> specified by the `localEP` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>和繫結至<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>所指定`localEP`參數。

trans-unit.source: Before you call this constructor, you must create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the IP address and port number from which you intend to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫這個建構函式之前，您必須建立<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用您想要傳送和接收資料的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to specify a local IP address and port number for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要指定本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: If you do not, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果不這麼做，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適合的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with the address family specified by the `localEP` parameter that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with a different address family.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個建構函式，則<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>執行個體已設定與所指定的位址系列`localEP`無法變更或覆寫與不同的位址系列的連線方法呼叫的參數。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class using a local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>類別使用的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="localEP" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="localEP" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily" /> values that specifies the addressing scheme of the socket.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily" /> 值，指定通訊端的定址配置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `family` parameter determines whether the listener uses an IP version 4 address (IPv4) or an IP version 6 (IPv6) address.
trans-unit.target: `family`參數會決定接聽程式使用 IP 第 4 版 (IPv4) 位址或 IP 版本 6 (IPv6) 位址。

trans-unit.source: To use an IPv4 address, pass the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 IPv4 位址，將傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork>值。

trans-unit.source: To use an IPv6 address, pass the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 IPv6 位址，將傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6>值。

trans-unit.source: Passing any other value will cause the method to throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞任何其他值會導致方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with the address family specified by the `family` parameter that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with a different address family.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個建構函式，則<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>執行個體已設定與所指定的位址系列`family`無法變更或覆寫與不同的位址系列的連線方法呼叫的參數。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> is not suitable for joining a multicast group because it does not perform socket binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>不適用於聯結多點傳送的群組，因為它不會執行通訊端繫結。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="family" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="family" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The port on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 通訊埠，將會在此處接聽連入的連接嘗試。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily" /> values that specifies the addressing scheme of the socket.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily" /> 值，指定通訊端的定址配置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> class and binds it to the local port number provided.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將它繫結至提供的本機通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and binds it to the port number from which you intend to communicate.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>並將它連結至您要通訊的通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: The `family` parameter determines whether the listener uses an IP version 4 address (IPv4) or an IP version 6 (IPv6) address.
trans-unit.target: `family`參數會決定接聽程式使用 IP 第 4 版 (IPv4) 位址或 IP 版本 6 (IPv6) 位址。

trans-unit.source: To use an IPv4 address, pass the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 IPv4 位址，將傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork>值。

trans-unit.source: To use an IPv6 address, pass the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 IPv6 位址，將傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6>值。

trans-unit.source: Passing any other value will cause the method to throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞任何其他值會導致方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with the address family specified by the `family` parameter that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with a different address family.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個建構函式，則<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>執行個體已設定與所指定的位址系列`family`無法變更或覆寫與不同的位址系列的連線方法呼叫的參數。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，請參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN 中錯誤的詳細描述。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a UDP client to use in a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用多點傳送群組中的 UDP 用戶端。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="family" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="family" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="port" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="port" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The name of the remote DNS host to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: 您想連接的遠端 DNS 主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The remote port number to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: 您想連接的遠端通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> class and establishes a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體，並建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> and establishes a remote host using the `hostname` and `port` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>和建立遠端主機使用`hostname`和`port`參數。

trans-unit.source: Establishing a default remote host is optional.
trans-unit.target: 建立預設遠端主機是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor, you do not have to specify a remote host in each call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個建構函式，您不必在每次呼叫中指定遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a default remote host limits you to that host only.
trans-unit.target: 指定預設遠端主機限制為只有該主機。

trans-unit.source: You can change the default remote host at any time by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以隨時變更預設遠端主機，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a remote host in your call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method, do not use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要在呼叫中指定遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法時，請勿使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class using a host name and port number.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>類別使用主機名稱和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostname" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostname" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="port" /> is not between <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" /> and <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="port" /> 不在 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" /> 之間。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a default remote host has been established.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已經建立預設的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a connection is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接為作用中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> can use this property to determine if a default remote host has been established.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>可以使用這個屬性來判斷是否已成功建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: You can establish a default remote host by using the appropriate constructor or by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立預設遠端主機，使用適當的建構函式，或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do establish a default remote host, you cannot specify a remote host in your call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有建立預設遠端主機，您就無法呼叫中指定遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable or disable NAT traversal.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指定是否啟用或停用 NAT 周遊。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal on a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用在 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 執行個體上的網路位址轉譯 (NAT) 周遊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.AllowNatTraversal%2A> method is used to enable or disable NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.AllowNatTraversal%2A>方法用來啟用或停用的 NAT 周遊<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Teredo、 6to4 或 ISATAP 通道提供 NAT 周遊。

trans-unit.source: When the `allowed` parameter is false, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.IPProtectionLevel> option on the associated socket is set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel.EdgeRestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 當`allowed`參數為 false，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.IPProtectionLevel>相關聯的通訊端上的選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel.EdgeRestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This explicitly disables NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此明確地停用的 NAT 周遊<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the `allowed` parameter is true, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.IPProtectionLevel> option on the associated socket is set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 當`allowed`參數為 true，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.IPProtectionLevel>相關聯的通訊端上的選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This may allow NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> depending on firewall rules in place on the system.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會讓 NAT 周遊<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>根據在系統上的防火牆規則。

trans-unit.source: A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32.
trans-unit.target: Teredo 位址是 IPv6 位址首碼為 2001年:: / 32。

trans-unit.source: Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.
trans-unit.target: Teredo 位址可透過一般的 DNS 名稱解析傳回或列舉為指派給本機介面的 IPv6 位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of data received from the network that is available to read.
trans-unit.target: 取得已從網路接收且可供讀取的資料量。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data received from the network.
trans-unit.target: 從網路接收之資料的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Available%2A> property is used to determine the amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Available%2A>屬性用來決定的資料量排入佇列進行讀取的網路緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: If data is available, call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> to get the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料是提供，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>取得的資料。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Available%2A> property returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可用，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Available%2A>屬性會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Available%2A> property throws a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機或關閉連接，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Available%2A>屬性會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)/ for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定錯誤碼，並請參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼文件位於 MSDN library 中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)/ 如需詳細的說明發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Available%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Available%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的物件，包含接收作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>requestCallback</c> delegate when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>requestCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Receives a datagram from a remote host asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 非同步接收遠端主機的資料包。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous receive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，參考非同步接收。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginReceive%2A> operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.EndReceive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginReceive%2A>作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.EndReceive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`requestCallback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation is complete, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖，直到作業完成為止，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.target: 包含傳送作業相關資訊的使用者定義物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>requestCallback</c> delegate when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>requestCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.target: 目的端由先前對 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect" /> 的呼叫指定。

trans-unit.target: 非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginSend%2A>作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.EndSend%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate.

trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定基礎網路 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> 建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用來傳送和接收資料透過網路。

trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>可以使用這個屬性來取得或設定此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A> if you require access beyond that which <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> provides.
trans-unit.target: 使用基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>從傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>如果您需要存取超過其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>提供。

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A> to set the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to an existing <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>設基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>至現有<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to take advantage of the simplicity of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> using a pre-existing <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，如果您想要充分利用的簡易性<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>使用預先存在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, broadcasting is enabled for the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，啟用廣播基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Closes the UDP connection.
trans-unit.target: 關閉 UDP 連接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Close%2A> disables the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Close%2A>停用基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>和所有相關聯的 managed 和 unmanaged 資源釋出<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates closing a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範右<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> that specifies the network endpoint to which you intend to send data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" />，指定您想傳送資料所至的網路端點。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a default remote host using the specified network endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的網路端點，建立預設的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method establishes a default remote host using the value specified in the `endPoint` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法使用，建立預設遠端主機中指定的值`endPoint`參數。

trans-unit.source: Once established, you do not have to specify a remote host in each call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立，您不必在每次呼叫中指定遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Establishing a default remote host is optional.
trans-unit.target: 建立預設遠端主機是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a default remote host limits you to that host only.
trans-unit.target: 指定預設遠端主機限制為只有該主機。

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to a different remote host, you must make another call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method or create another <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> without a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要傳送資料包至不同的遠端主機，您必須進行另一個呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法或建立另一個<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>但不使用預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: If you have established a default remote host and you also provide a remote host in your call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已建立預設遠端主機，而且您也提供遠端主機呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method, any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法時，除了指定的預設將會被捨棄，從位址到達任何資料包。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the default remote host to a broadcast address using this method unless you inherit from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>, use the Client method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法設定預設遠端主機到廣播位址，使用這個方法，除非您繼承自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>，使用用戶端方法，取得基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，並將通訊端選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can however, broadcast data to the default broadcast address, 255.255.255.255, if you specify <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType> in your call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過您可以、 廣播到預設的資料會廣播位址，255.255.255.255，如果您指定<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If your application requires greater control over broadcast addresses, you can also revert to using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式需要較大的控制權廣播位址，您也可以還原成使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>類別。

trans-unit.source: Since the UDP protocol is connectionless, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 因為 UDP 通訊協定是無連線、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method if you intend to receive multicasted datagrams.
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法，如果您想要接收乘以資料包。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> allows Internet Protocol (IP) datagrams to be fragmented.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 是否允許將網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 資料包分散。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> allows datagram fragmentation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 允許資料包分散，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Datagrams require fragmentation when their size exceeds the Maximum Transfer Unit (MTU) of the transmission medium.
trans-unit.target: 資料包需要片段，其大小超過最大傳輸單位 (MTU) 的傳輸媒介時。

trans-unit.source: Datagrams may be fragmented by the sending host or by an intermediate router.
trans-unit.target: 傳送主控件，或中繼路由器可能被分割資料包。

trans-unit.source: If a datagram must be fragmented, and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A> option is set, the datagram is discarded, and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) error message is sent back to the sender of the datagram.
trans-unit.target: 如果必須分散資料包 (datagram)，而<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A>選項設定，資料包作業會捨棄，並且傳回給寄件者的資料包傳送網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMP) 錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only for sockets that use the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> flag or the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> flag.
trans-unit.target: 只可以為使用 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 旗標或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> 旗標的通訊端設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Leaves a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 保留多點傳送 (Multicast) 群組。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the multicast group to leave.
trans-unit.target: 要保留的多點傳送群組其 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: Leaves a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 保留多點傳送 (Multicast) 群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A> method withdraws the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> from the multicast group identified by the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>方法會提領<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>從多點傳送群組所指定識別<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A> method, the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends an Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) packet to the router, removing the router from the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>方法時，基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>將網際網路群組管理通訊協定 (IGMP) 封包傳送至路由器，從多點傳送群組中移除的路由器。

trans-unit.source: After a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> withdraws from the group, it will no longer be able to receive datagrams sent to that group.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>會提領從群組中，它將不再能夠接收資料包傳送至該群組。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to drop a multicast group by providing a multicast address.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何藉由提供多點傳送的位址中卸除多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The IP address is not compatible with the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily" /> value that defines the addressing scheme of the socket.
trans-unit.target: IP 位址與 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily" /> 值不相容，這個值定義著通訊端的定址配置。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="multicastAddr" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="multicastAddr" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the multicast group to leave.
trans-unit.target: 要保留的多點傳送群組其 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: The local address of the multicast group to leave.
trans-unit.target: 要保留之多點傳送群組的本機位址。

trans-unit.source: Leaves a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 保留多點傳送 (Multicast) 群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A> method withdraws the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> from the multicast group identified by the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>方法會提領<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>從多點傳送群組所指定識別<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A> method, the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends an Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) packet to the router, removing the router from the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>方法時，基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>將網際網路群組管理通訊協定 (IGMP) 封包傳送至路由器，從多點傳送群組中移除的路由器。

trans-unit.source: After a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> withdraws from the group, it will no longer be able to receive datagrams sent to that group.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>會提領從群組中，它將不再能夠接收資料包傳送至該群組。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to drop a multicast group by providing a multicast address.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何藉由提供多點傳送的位址中卸除多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The IP address is not compatible with the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily" /> value that defines the addressing scheme of the socket.
trans-unit.target: IP 位址與 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily" /> 值不相容，這個值定義著通訊端的定址配置。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="multicastAddr" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="multicastAddr" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> may send or receive broadcast packets.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 是否可以傳送或接收廣播封包。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> allows broadcast packets; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 允許廣播封包，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Broadcasting is limited to a specific subnet.
trans-unit.target: 廣播會限制為特定的子網路。

trans-unit.source: You can broadcast to your local subnet by sending a packet to 255.255.255.255; or, you can use the directed broadcast address, which is the network portion of an Internet Protocol (IP) address with all bits set in the host portion.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將封包傳送到 255.255.255.255; 廣播給您本機子網路或者，您可以使用導向的廣播的位址，也就是使用中的主機部分設定的所有位元的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址的網路部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your IP address is 192.168.1.40 (a Class C address, with the network portion as the first three octets, and the host portion is the last octet), your directed broadcast address is 192.168.1.255.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的 IP 位址是的 192.168.1.40 （類別 C 位址，與網路部分為的前三個八位元的主機部分是最後一個八位元），導向的廣播的位址為 192.168.1.255。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.EnableBroadcast%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.EnableBroadcast%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginReceive(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginReceive(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: The specified remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 指定的遠端端點。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous receive.
trans-unit.target: 結束暫止的非同步接收。

trans-unit.source: If successful, an array of bytes that contains datagram data.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，即為包含資料包資料的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖直到作業完成。

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式執行這項作業，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginSend%2A> to complete an asynchronous receive of a server response.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginSend%2A>完成伺服器回應的非同步接收。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginReceive(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginReceive(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.EndReceive(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.IPEndPoint@)" /> was previously called for the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 先前已針對非同步讀取呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.EndReceive(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.IPEndPoint@)" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object returned by a call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginSend" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，由對 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginSend" /> 的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 結束暫止的非同步傳送。

trans-unit.source: If successful, the number of bytes sent to the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，則為要傳送至 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖直到作業完成。

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式執行這項作業，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginSend%2A> to complete an asynchronous send of a server request.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.BeginSend%2A>完成的伺服器要求的非同步傳送。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend(System.IAsyncResult)" /> was previously called for the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 先前已針對非同步讀取呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend(System.IAsyncResult)" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the underlying socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取基礎通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> allows only one client to use a port.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 是否只允許一個用戶端使用連接埠。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> allows only one client to use a specific port; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 只允許一個用戶端使用特定通訊埠則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" /> for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and <see langword="false" /> for all other versions.
trans-unit.target: 若為 Windows Server 2003 和 Windows XP Service Pack 2 (含) 以後版本，則預設值為 <see langword="true" />；若為所有其他版本，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, multiple clients can use a specific port; however, only one of the clients can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，多個用戶端可以使用特定通訊埠。不過，只有其中一個用戶端可以執行網路流量傳送至連接埠的作業。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property to prevent multiple clients from using a specific port.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>防止多個用戶端使用特定通訊埠的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before the underlying socket is bound to a client port.
trans-unit.target: 基礎通訊端的用戶端連接埠繫結之前，必須設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the client port is bound as a side effect of the constructor, and you cannot subsequently set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>、 用戶端連接埠繫結副作用的建構函式，而您之後無法設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>屬性

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>, and gets and sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>，以及取得和設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the underlying socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取基礎通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 加入至多點傳送群組。

trans-unit.source: The multicast <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the group you want to join.
trans-unit.target: 您要聯結的群組其多點傳送 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 加入至多點傳送群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> method subscribes the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> to a multicast group using the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>方法會訂閱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>使用指定的多點傳送群組<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> method, the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends an Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) packet to the router requesting membership to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>方法時，基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>網際網路群組管理通訊協定 (IGMP) 封包傳送到要求的多點傳送群組成員資格的路由器。

trans-unit.source: The multicast address range is 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255.

If you specify an address outside this range or if the router to which the request is made is not multicast enabled, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定在這個範圍之外的位址，或提出要求時的路由器不是多點傳送的啟用，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> is listed with the router as a member of the multicast group, it will be able to receive multicasted datagrams sent to the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>列為使用多點傳送群組的成員身分的路由器，它能夠接收 multicasted 資料包傳送至指定<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>。

trans-unit.source: You must create the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> using the multicast port number; otherwise, you will not be able to receive multicasted datagrams.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>使用多點傳送連接埠號碼; 否則您將無法接收 multicasted 資料包。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method prior to calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> method, or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method will not work.
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法之前呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>方法，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法將無法運作。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to belong to a multicast group to send datagrams to a multicast IP address.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要屬於要傳送資料包至多點傳送的 IP 位址的多點傳送群組。

trans-unit.source: Before joining a multicast group, make sure the socket is bound to the port or endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 之前聯結多點傳送的群組時，請確定通訊端繫結至連接埠或端點。

trans-unit.source: You do that by calling one of the constructors that accept a port or an endpoint as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可透過呼叫其中一個接受連接埠或端點做為參數的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To stop receiving multicasted datagrams, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A> method and provide the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of the group from which you would like to withdraw.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止接收乘以資料包，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>方法，並提供<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>從中您想要退出的群組。

trans-unit.source: In the IPv6 case, there are several multicast address ranges you can choose from.
trans-unit.target: 在 IPv6 的情況下，有數個多點傳送的位址範圍，您可以選擇。

trans-unit.source: Please, refer to the IETF RFC 2375.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 IETF RFC 2375。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> on a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> constructed without a specific local port (that is, using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29> constructor).
trans-unit.target: 您不能呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>上<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>建構不含特定本機連接埠 (也就使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29>建構函式)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.

trans-unit.source: Multicast is a scalable method for many-to-many communication on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送是網際網路上的多對多通訊的擴充方法。

trans-unit.source: If a process subscribes to a multicast address, any packets sent by that process are received by every other process that has subscribed to the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: 如果處理程序訂閱多點傳送位址，任何封包傳送程序會收到其他每個已訂閱的多點傳送位址的處理序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.MulticastLoopback%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.MulticastLoopback%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> that represents the remote host from which the data was sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" />，表示傳送資料的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: Returns a UDP datagram that was sent by a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 傳回由遠端主機傳送的 UDP 資料包。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains datagram data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，包含資料包資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method will block until a datagram arrives from a remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法將會封鎖直到資料包 (datagram) 收到來自遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: When data is available, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method will read the first enqueued datagram and return the data portion as a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 當資料可供使用，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法會讀取第一個加入佇列資料包，並傳回位元組陣列形式的資料部分。

trans-unit.source: This method populates the `remoteEP` parameter with the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> and port number of the sender.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會填入`remoteEP`參數<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>和寄件者的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a default remote host in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method will accept datagrams from that host only.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定預設遠端主機中的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法會接受該主控件只從資料包。

trans-unit.source: All other datagrams will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 將捨棄所有其他資料包。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: If you intend to receive multicasted datagrams, do not call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method prior to calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要接收的資料包乘以，請勿呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法之前呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> you use to receive datagrams must be created using the multicast port number.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>您用來接收資料包必須使用多點傳送連接埠號碼來建立。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method blocks execution until it receives a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>方法會封鎖執行，直到其接收到訊息。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> passed to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>, the identity of the responding host is revealed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>傳遞至<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>，顯示回應主機的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Returns a UDP datagram asynchronously that was sent by a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 非同步傳回由遠端主機傳送的 UDP 資料包。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>> object will complete after the UDP packet has been received.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>> 在收到 UDP 封包之後，物件會完成。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a default remote host in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method, this method will accept datagrams from that host only.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定預設遠端主機中的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法，這個方法會接受該主控件只從資料包。

trans-unit.source: All other datagrams will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 將捨棄所有其他資料包。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: If you intend to receive multicasted datagrams, do not call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method prior to calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要接收的資料包乘以，請勿呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法之前呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> you use to receive datagrams must be created using the multicast port number.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>您用來接收資料包必須使用多點傳送連接埠號碼來建立。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Sends a UDP datagram to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 將 UDP 資料包傳送至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that specifies the UDP datagram that you intend to send represented as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，指定您想傳送的 UDP 資料包 (表示為位元組陣列)。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the datagram.
trans-unit.target: 資料包中的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Sends a UDP datagram to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 將 UDP 資料包傳送至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: 已傳送的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: This overload sends datagrams to the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method and returns the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會資料包傳送至遠端主機中建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法並傳回傳送的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: If you do not call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> before calling this overload, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>之前呼叫這個多載，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to a different remote host, you must call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method and specify the desired remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要傳送資料包至不同的遠端主機，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法並指定所需的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: Use either of the other <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method overloads to send datagrams to a broadcast address.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法多載來傳送資料包至廣播位址。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must establish a default remote host prior to using this overload.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立預設遠端主機，然後再使用這個多載。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dgram" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dgram" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> has already established a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 已經建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that specifies the UDP datagram that you intend to send, represented as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，指定您想傳送的 UDP 資料包 (表示為位元組陣列)。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the datagram.
trans-unit.target: 資料包中的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> that represents the host and port to which to send the datagram.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" />，表示傳送資料包的目標主機和通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: Sends a UDP datagram to the host at the specified remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 將 UDP 資料包傳送至指定遠端端點上的主機。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: 已傳送的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method sends datagrams to the specified endpoint and returns the number of bytes successfully sent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法傳送資料包至指定的端點，並傳回成功傳送的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this overload, you must first create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the IP address and port number of the remote host to which your datagrams will be delivered.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個多載，您必須先建立<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用您資料包傳送遠端主機的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: You can send datagrams to the default broadcast address, 255.255.255.255, by specifying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Address%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以傳送資料包至預設廣播位址，255.255.255.255，藉由指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>如<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Address%2A>屬性<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>。

trans-unit.source: After you have created this <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>, pass it to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method as the `endPoint` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 建立這之後<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>，將它傳遞給<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法以做為`endPoint`參數。

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to any other broadcast address, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要傳送資料包到任何其他的廣播位址，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>方法，以取得基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，並將通訊端選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can also revert to using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以還原成使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>類別。

trans-unit.source: Do not provide an `endPoint` parameter to this method if you have already established a remote host with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 未提供`endPoint`參數，這個方法，如果您已建立與遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您這樣做，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您取得這個程式碼，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example uses an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> to specify the target host.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>來指定目標主機。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dgram" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dgram" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient" /> 已經建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，指定您想傳送的 UDP 資料包 (表示為位元組陣列)。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the datagram.
trans-unit.target: 資料包中的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The name of the remote host to which you intend to send the datagram.
trans-unit.target: 您要傳送資料包之目標遠端主機的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The remote port number with which you intend to communicate.
trans-unit.target: 您要用來通訊的遠端連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Sends a UDP datagram to a specified port on a specified remote host.
